languages.text: "Я ни в коей мере не хотел принизить величие Светоча... впрочем, вы правы. Довольно. Я умолкаю".

traits.locale_text: "Я ни в коей мере не хотел принизить величие Светоча... впрочем, вы правы. Довольно. Я умолкаю".

languages.text: "I did not mean to belittle the Beacon's greatness... Still, you are right. I will say no more."
languages.original_text: "Я ни в коей мере не хотел принизить величие Светоча... впрочем, вы правы. Довольно. Я умолкаю".

traits.locale_text: "I did not want to belittle the Beacon's greatness by any means... Still, you are right. That's enough. I will keep quiet."
"I did not want to belittle the Beacon's greatness by any means... Still, you are right. That's enough. I will keep quiet."
"I did not mean to belittle the Beacon's greatness... Still, you are right. Enough. I will keep quiet."
"I did not mean to belittle the Beacon's greatness... Still, you are right. Enough. I will keep quiet."
"I did not mean to belittle the Beacon's greatness... Still, you are right. I will say no more."

languages.text: “我无意贬低尊崇的至高明光……不过你说得没错，好吧，我闭嘴就是了。”
languages.original_text: "I did not mean to belittle the Beacon's greatness... Still, you are right. I will say no more."

traits.locale_text: “我无意贬低尊崇的至高明光……不过你说得没错，好吧，我闭嘴就是了。”

languages.text: « Je n'essaie pas de remettre en question la grandeur {mf|du|de la} Guide... Mais vous avez raison. Très bien, je me tais. »
languages.original_text: "I did not mean to belittle the Beacon's greatness... Still, you are right. I will say no more."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'essaie pas de remettre en question la grandeur {mf|du|de la} Guide... Mais vous avez raison. Très bien, je me tais. »

languages.text: 「大いなる烽火の偉大さを卑下するつもりなどなかったのだが…でも、君の言う通り。これ以上は口を慎もう」
languages.original_text: "I did not mean to belittle the Beacon's greatness... Still, you are right. I will say no more."

traits.locale_text: 「大いなる烽火の偉大さを卑下するつもりなどなかったのだが…でも、君の言う通り。これ以上は口を慎もう」

languages.text: «No tenía intención de menospreciar la grandeza del Faro... pero tiene razón. No diré más».
languages.original_text: "I did not mean to belittle the Beacon's greatness... Still, you are right. I will say no more."

traits.locale_text: «No tenía intención de menospreciar la grandeza del Faro... pero tiene razón. No diré más».

languages.text: "Ich wollte die Erhabenheit des Lichts nicht herabsetzen ... Aber Ihr habt recht. Ich werde nichts mehr sagen."
languages.original_text: "I did not mean to belittle the Beacon's greatness... Still, you are right. I will say no more."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wollte die Erhabenheit des Lichts nicht herabsetzen ... Aber Ihr habt recht. Ich werde nichts mehr sagen."
"Ich wollte die Erhabenheit des Lichts nicht herabsetzen ... Doch Ihr habt recht. Genug. Ich bin still."

languages.text: "Kılavuz'un yüceliğini küçümsemek istemedim... Haklısın tabii. Çenemi kapayacağım."
languages.original_text: "I did not mean to belittle the Beacon's greatness... Still, you are right. I will say no more."
